name: Taktile
long_description: Taktile is building the world's leading software platform for running critical and highly automated decisions. Our customers use our product to catch fraudsters, prevent money laundering, and expand access to credit for small businesses, among many other use cases. Taktile is already making millions of such decisions across the globe every day.
